hierarchicalDatasource.query: select a from wf$CardAttachment a where a.card.id = :ds$cardDs order by a.createTs desc

collectionDatasource.query: select c from wf$CardRelation c where (c.card.id = :ds$cardDs or c.relatedCard.id = :ds$cardDs)
select d from thesissummer$OrderDocument d where d.versionOf.id = :ds$cardDs order by d.createTs
select e from df$Employee e left join e.user user where (user is null or user.active = true) order by e.name
select c from sys$Category c where c.entityType='thesissummer$OrderDocument'
select c from df$Category c where (c.docKind.id = :ds$cardDs.docKind or c.docKind is null) and c.docType.id = :ds$cardDs.docKind.docType order by c.name
select c from df$Contractor c order by c.name
select d from df$Department d where d.organization.id = :ds$organizationDs order by d.name
select o from df$Organization o order by o.name
